name: Nancy Drew®: Secret of the Old Clock
description: Venture into the Past and Outwit a Criminal Before Time Runs Out!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 98/ME/2000/XP/Vista Processor: 400 MHz CPU Memory: 64MB RAM Graphics: 16-bit DirectX compatible video card DirectX®: 8.0 or higher Hard Drive: 300MB of free space Sound: 16-bit DirectX compatible sound card

reviews.review_text: I have played almost all of the Nancy Drew games. This one has been my favorite so far. I loved that it was set back in time and the mini games were not irritating like some of the games.
